Interface IPlanTaskForm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlanTaskForm

    public interface IPlanTaskForm

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Developer> getDevelopers(java.util.List<Developer> developers)
      This method will ask the user to select the required developers to perform the task.

    • Method Detail

      • getProjectWithUnplannedTasks

        Project getProjectWithUnplannedTasks(java.util.List<Project> projects,
                                   java.util.List<java.util.List<Task>> unplannedTasks)
                                     throws ShouldExitException
        This method will show all the projects with their unplanned tasks and ask the user to select a project. When the user selected one, it will return this project.
        Parameters:
        projects -
        unplannedTasks -
        Returns:
        Returns the selected project.
        Throws:
        ShouldExitException - [CAN] The user cancelled the planning of the task.

      • getStartTime

        org.joda.time.DateTime getStartTime(java.util.Set<org.joda.time.DateTime> startTimes)
                                    throws ShouldExitException
        This method will ask the user to select to appropriate start time or enter a custom one. Afterwards it will return this start time as a DateTime.
        Parameters:
        startTimes -
        Returns:
        Returns the select start time as a DateTime.
        Throws:
        ShouldExitException - [CAN] The user cancelled the planning of the task.

      • getResources

        java.util.List<Resource> getResources(TimeSpan timeSpan,
                                    java.util.List<ResourceType> resourceTypes,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> amounts,
                                    java.util.List<java.util.List<Resource>> suggestedResources)
                                      throws ShouldExitException
        This method will show the user the suggested list of resource according to the required resource types of the task. The user can choose to edit this suggested list or leave it the way it is. Afterwards this method will return the list of resources the user has chosen.
        Parameters:
        timeSpan -
        resourceTypes -
        amounts -
        suggestedResources -
        Returns:
        Returns a list of resources the user has chosen.
        Throws:
        ShouldExitException - [CAN] The user cancelled the planning of the task.

      • getDevelopers

        java.util.List<Developer> getDevelopers(java.util.List<Developer> developers)
                                        throws ShouldExitException
        This method will ask the user to select the required developers to perform the task. It will return the list of selected developer.
        Parameters:
        developers -
        Returns:
        Returns the list of selected developers.
        Throws:
        ShouldExitException - [CAN] The user cancelled the planning of the task.
